Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 070507 ZSX, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of the Bronx, Council District no. 17 to facilitate construction of an eight-story mixed use building.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
